channel.title: IGP on Code Blocks
channel.description: Recent content in IGP on Code Blocks

item.title: Nanopore Basecalling
item.description: Context We are currently sequencing old (500-1500 years old) statues, manuscripts and parchments in order to assess which microorganisms grow/grew on them. To this aim illumina, torrent and now nanopore sequencing are being used. Nanopore sequencing is being done in our lab. The main problem once we got the fast5 data is to basecall them and do further processing. The next few paragraph present an overview of the step we are doing:
